title: Machine Learning Model Design Project for Early Delirium Prediction After Microvascular Decompression

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Project execution in a limited-technology environment, emphasizing smartphone-based data analysis and collaborative tools.

learning_goals: Based on medical data, identify and explain five or more predictive factors for early delirium.
Apply four or more machine learning models, including logistic regression, decision trees, random forests, and GBM.
Interpret model performance metrics (AUC, accuracy) and select the optimal model.
Visualize and present team-based analysis results using smartphone-based collaborative tools.

resources: Open-source data analysis tools (Google Colab, Weka, etc.)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
